title: Inside Europe 28.07.22
description: Moscow now wants regime change in Ukraine, we meet the Russian dissidents creating a new life in Georgia, and EU countries agree to cut their gas use. Also: how the monkeypox outbreak is stirring memories of HIV stigmatization, the Spanish island of La Palma recalls last year's volcanic eruption, and avoiding Europe's flight chaos, but will taking the train be any better?
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Inside Europe, Nik Martin, Russia's invasion of Ukraine, Kherson, Europe gas crisis, Russian dissidents, La Palma eruption, volcano, UK travel chaos, rail travel
